google_play_reviews.content: I love this privacy-friendly sudoku. I have been playing it for about a year and it is my go to while waiting on the wife or at the MD office. No ads of any kinda!
THE BEST. Truly the best.

Das UI der App ist klasse, sehr durchdacht und funktioniert gut. Aber der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist selbst auf Leicht viel zu oft viel zu hoch. Musste gerade jetzt auf Leicht nach 20 Minuten mit Raten anfangen. Auf der Stufe würde ich aber doch erwarten, dass es im Wesentlichen ohne Notizen geht, ist hier aber leider oft nicht der Fall. Schade, das frustriert dann doch ganz schön.
Love it and best of all respects your privacy. Thank you for that 🙂
Play this Ad free game all the time. Thank you.
Free, No ads. Do I need to say more? 4 Different difficulties Can import your own Sudoku puzzles Pencil marks, highlights. Really good app if you just want Sudoku and Sudoku only

Best Sudoku app on the Play Store. No ads, 3 different modes with 4 different difficulties, there's a dark mode, and I can see all my stats. I just focus on how I play without being interrupted. I would honestly pay more for this app if I could because it is worth the time for any beginners out there. Just top notch.
No Ads yay :D It would be nice if timer can be hide.

Devs made buttons big and board small. Ignored complaints from multiple users. Game is unplayable on many phones now. 18 months later still no fix. Look elsewhere for a decent game app. These guys don't care.
Exactly what is says it is.. that is it and dark mode that works..
Best sudoku app
Broken in dark mode.
Try this one. I love it.

With the latest update, when you've used up all the numbers it turns green to let you know. I love this! Other sudoku games that I've played (online or on my computer) rarely indicate when the numbers are all used until you finish the game.
Best sudoku I've ever played. Simple and straightforward with no privacy invasion.

I've been using this app since 2016. It's the best Sudoku game I've come across yet. No ads, no internet access needed. Unlimited games, choose your difficulty level, it works flawlessly. Highly recommend! 2021 update. Now the numbers change from blue to green as each number is completely solved. I love this enhancement. My clearing time is definitely helped by this improvement. Thanks to the devs. I didn't think you could improve on an already awesome game but you did. Still my favorite sudoku!

PLEASE make the font bigger for when you write in possibilities for a square. I have a small phone and I cant read them. Or if you can't make it bigger or give options in settings, then somehow indicate via the number keys which numbers you have added to the box (a dot in the number? Underline the number?) when you select a given box. I can't play this with how small it shows up on my phone about font size of 4 I can send ss if you want
Everything you want, nothing you don't
Best Sudoku app! My only gripe is that the cell highlights are hard to see in dark mode. Other than that, I love everything about this!

Great app. I really appreciate the dark theme. Please consider adding a switch for it in settings, that offers a switch for the mode, on the game face. Users would be able to one-click toggle it, while non-users wouldn't see an intrusion. Also, please improve the highlighted box tool. The yellow highlight over black surface is much more difficult to link together visually, so I'm not using dark mode yet but I want to. Thx =)
Was great but latest update has turned the lovely green to a urine colour! How do we change it or delete update please? How do we get back to previous version please???

I love to play this game for hours every day. Got new update this morning and the size of the game field has shrunk making it virtually impossible to play on my phone. Very sad and disappointed. Please fix
Used to be the best, but the grid is now way to small since latest update. Play is now impossible :(
Dark mode is a welcome change however the colour scheme needs improving. Buttons are way too bright while the number highlights are very difficult to see.
Playing field is too small since the last update, please revert that. It is an enormous usability issue on smaller phones

It's been fixed. It's sadly broken after the last update it no longer highlights input mistakes the vast majority of the time and the difficulty levels no long seem to matter. It was a great game at it's too bad. I hope the next update fixes thing so I can change the rating to 5 stars

THANK YOU!! for adding dark theme! My rating is now 7/5! Love you guys! Prev. Review: 5/5, would be 6/5 with a dark/amoled theme. I like to solve sudoku when I'm having trouble falling asleep, but I have to use another app (still open source, but has inferior controls) with dark theme >:( <3
If i could give more stars, i would. Adding in dark mode, *chefs kiss*
What has happened to the horizontal grid lines? It makes the game so difficult to play since you removed them. Considering uninstalling because of it, its spoilt a really good game.
Even the easiest option is unsolvable (I tried to prove my assumption and hinted all boxes and it's still unsolvable) I don't know if it's just me but I tried multiple times 🙃
The best sudoku game, but battery consumption is more than normal.
Love how minimal this is, as in no requirements at all. How games should be! But the 'challenge' level is not challenging at all. It's extremely easy. For that I am deleting.
Works perfectly. Just wish it had an error check option
Add Free....Very Interactive Interface.... Nice work.... Loved this .....Thanks for making this Add Free
After update v3.0 it does not open
Amazing experience
Even in easy you have to guess, sometimes. Looks like there is no control, purely random sets. Also, no indication how many left of each number.
It's sudoku with no ads or unnecessary permissions.
Addictive with neat UI and Ads free
Best sudoku app, but crashes with Android 10. NEEDS AN UPDATE!
Straight forward Sudoku game with good tools and challenging puzzles, with no ads and no need for internet access. Absolutely wonderful!
Please add dark theme, and update generally, thanks.

nice game, only complaints is it's to helpful, there are setting to adjust for some of that. I play to relax so timer not helping. The best thing is permission free, I would be more than happy to pay for this. it's a shame Google doesn't help you find app's like this in the play store. Update: Game levels setting from easy to challenging not working very well.
good stuff
Simple, clean, no adds. Has all the features I have liked in other sudoku apps. What more can I ask for?
Good Sudoku without ads. Periodically, while playing a 6x6 moderate to relax, a hard one appears. Otherwise, good.

Love the fact that this app requires no permissions and would gladly even pay for it. Downside is on the two hardest settings, many times the puzzles are not solvable without guessing after getting so far. Even with adding notations, you essentially need to remember when you started guessing and then if you guessed wrong, hit undo until you started the guess and then change it. IMO, it takes the fun out of it.
Love the game would give it 5 stars but it over heats my phone in less than a minute. I know its the app because other games don't over heat my phone.
Great way to spend my time
Numbees are bold and hard on he eyes
Cleaner layout... please include Option for dark mode. Observed increase battery consumption when using the app....

I love everything about this except: PLEASE fix the difficulty!! IDK 
whether that means fixing an algorithm or just sorting them properly but 
this is a glaring.issue in n otherwise amazing app. Thank you!

I love the lack of ads and permissions, however for some strange reason the 
board took up my whole screen, meaning that there was absolutely no way to 
input the numbers. Obviously this made the entire app unusable. The issue 
probably has something to do with the fact that my screen is only 3".
Intuitive and clean UI without ads.

This is what a sudoku game should be, simple graphics, no ads no 
permission. It would be a lot better if notes can be auto filled based on 
current board.

Difficulty is all over the place. I like to play this for fun in between 
breaks... so I try to match difficulty with how much time I have. Cannot do 
thus with the app.

I love the lack of permissions! More games should follow this lead. I'm fairly new to playing Sudoku though and the easy version just wasn't simple enough for me. Games should be fun.. not give me a headache. Pixel 2 XL
The best Sudoku app I could find.
Great app.  minimal and claen, yet has all features needed.  and no permission needed!  however, just very minor glitch that doesn't affect game results.  the only app that i use for sudoku.
Great app. Easy to navigate, no frills.
Pretty good, but missing one key feature. It would be perfect with a night mode/dark theme.
Change theme colors please.
decent sudoku game with no adverts.  nice user interface,  which is not cluttered and is easy to use
The easy puzzles are not easy, great sodoku game for advanced players.
Good. Removed a star as it needs an Exit option. Only way to close fully is to force stop.
Love the lack of ads. Intuitive enough controls. Would recommend
There is 0 consistency between level diffficulty. That can be really frustrating.
good and easy to use. It would be great if one could enter custom puzzles. Crashes quite often but game can be resumed. Would be good if could check whether board is correct so far.
heating up my phone...  confirmed high power usage by looking at battery settings too. also would've liked an option to highlight a mistake in red without revealing the correct answer.
Good game. I love it
It works great and has zero ads! Thank you, developer!
No permissions required, no ads, no fuss, no bother …
I really like the modes and difficulty level. Not to easy on easy mode but doable and you can take a challenge if you seek one ;)

Very simple layout, doesn't take over the whole screen, and the best part (as far as I'm concerned) it doesn't eat up my battery. The lack of intrusive ads and that it's on the SD card are added bonuses. This is the first app that has inspired me to rate & review it. To the developers... Thank you.
I like this game. But if I switch screens...The app unfortunately has to close and I lose all
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reporting, we looked into that problem in the new version.

google_play_reviews.content: The best Sudoku AP, by far. NO ADS, clear easy to use interface. Just perfect.
It's free and no ads !
Aswm
This app was too basic limited levels wishing more puzzles in a level. 5stars for the being friendly with privacy and for the great hardwork in making this app. More Power.

I like a pretty simple sodoku app. Similar to paper, I want notes, maybe a single hint; I am OK with number highlighting. I don't want those "power ups" or stupid cheating "features" I just want it plain and simple. This app is just like I want it. Notes, single hint, number highlighting, and it allows me to keep several games open to switch between, an advantage of paper. Best of all no ads or spying! Hands down the best app for sodoku. If people knew about this there would be 50 million downloads
No ads, simple

Bastante raro que el usuario común revise los permisos que le otorga a las aplicaciones que descarga. El privacy friendly sudoku invita a la reflexión, qué permisos requiere una app sudoku para funcionar: ninguno.

Straightforward interface yet unpolished in mechanics (erasing numbers is a chore). No adds whatsoever or extra permissions. Still, the app needs some work. Plenty of improper puzzles in the easy level. Not unsolvable, but require advanced or higher techiques to solve (Nishio guessing, xwing, swordfish,etc) at the easy level.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the comment. We have added a new easy level to improve that problem.
